item.title: Why Does the Stock Market Keep Rising?
item.description: Strong corporate earnings, mostly stable tariff rates and the expectation of interest rate cuts have eased worries of a market reckoning.

item.title: With a Shovel and a Dream, Woman Finds 2.3 Carat Diamond in Arkansas
item.description: After three weeks, with bug bites and tattered hiking boots, Micherre Fox found the stone at Crater of Diamonds State Park.
